Verify the primary navigation link 'About Us' is visible at x: 50px, y: 20px, displays text 'About Us' with color #333333, font weight 500, and padding 10px 15px
Verify its background color becomes #F0F0F0 on hover with a 150ms transition
Verify the 'Contact' link has a border bottom 2px solid transparent, changing to #007BFF on selection

On the product detail page, verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, has text 'Add to Cart' with font size 18px, font family 'Montserrat', background color #008000, border radius 8px, horizontal dimension 200px, vertical dimension 50px, and is enabled
Verify when active, its opacity reduces to 0.7 for 100ms and its color changes to #FFFFFF
Trigger the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog
Verify the dialog's header displays 'Confirm Deletion' with type size 22px, font family 'Roboto', color #333333, and background color #F8F8F8
Verify the close button has aria-label 'Close dialog', is visible at x: 470px, y: 15px relative to modal, with width 30px, height 30px, and border radius 50%
Play the embedded video on 'https://example.com/media/clip'
Verify the video player controls are visible initially
Verify the 'Mute' button shows a muted state with a visible speaker-off icon, and its background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.6)
Verify after 2 seconds, the video automatically enters fullscreen mode, with playback continuing at its current time
Verify the play button has opacity 1
Perform a search for 'laptops'
Verify exactly 10 search results are displayed
Verify each result's title text is 'Product Name' with text size 16px, color #0000FF, and has top padding 5px
Verify each result item has a border bottom 1px solid #E0E0E0
Verify the product image for the first result has source 'laptop_pro.jpg', rendered dimensions 100x75px, and alt text 'High-Performance Laptop'
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible displaying 'Click for assistance' with background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 14px, border radius 4px, appears at x: 100px, y: 200px (relative to viewport), has width 150px, height 40px, and fades in with a 200ms opacity transition from 0 to 1
Open the 'Order History' table
Verify the table header has background color #F5F5F5 and color #666666
Verify the 'Order ID' column header displays 'Order ID' with font weight 600, padding 10px 15px, and text align 'left'
Verify each data row has vertical dimension 45px and a border bottom 1px solid #DDDDDD
Verify the table contains 5 columns
Submit the form with an empty 'Email' field

Verify an error message appears below the email input, displays text 'Email is required' with color #FF0000, font size 14px, is visible, has top margin 8px, width 250px, no alt text, transparent background, and its x position is aligned with the input field's left edge
Browse the image gallery
Verify exactly 5 thumbnail images are displayed
Verify each thumbnail has source 'thumb_img_N.jpg' (N=1..5), rendered dimensions 80x60px, and alt text 'Gallery image N'
Verify the first thumbnail is 'selected' with a border 2px solid #007BFF and opacity 1.0
Select another thumbnail
Verify its border color changes to #007BFF with a 150ms transition
Click on the 'Region' dropdown
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible below the input field and displays 5 options
Verify each option shows text 'Option N' (N=1..5) with background color #FFFFFF, font size 15px, and padding 8px 12px
Verify the currently 'selected' option has background color #E0E0E0 and color #000000
Verify the menu's width is 200px
Initiate a file upload
Verify a progress bar is displayed
Verify the progress bar has height 10px, border radius 5px, and background color #E0E0E0
Verify as upload progresses, the inner bar's width increases from 0% to 100% with background color #4CAF50
Verify an animation duration of 1 second for width change, and content 'Uploading...' is visible throughout the upload process
Open the calendar widget
Verify the current date (e.g., '15') is 'selected' with background color #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, and border radius 50%
Verify exactly 42 date cells are visible within the calendar grid
Verify the 'Next Month' button is enabled and has aria-label 'Next month'
Verify the calendar's top-left corner is at x: 200px, y: 300px
View the user's profile page
Verify the user avatar image has source 'user_avatar.png', rendered dimensions 100x100px, alt text 'User Profile Picture', border radius 50%, and loads within 300ms
Verify the user's name displays 'John Doe' with font size 24px, font weight 700, color #333333, is aligned 'center' below the avatar, with 15px top margin
Scroll to the bottom of the page
Verify the footer section is visible across the entire viewport width
Verify the copyright text displays '© 2024 MyCompany. All rights reserved.' with text size 14px, color #666666, background color #F8F8F8, padding 20px 0px, top margin 40px, and text align 'center'
Verify exactly 3 footer links are present
Interact with the product carousel

Verify both 'Previous' and 'Next' navigation arrows are visible at x: 10px and x: calc(100% - 40px) respectively, both having background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5), color #FFFFFF, width 30px, height 60px, border radius 4px, and opacity 0.8
Verify exactly 4 carousel indicators are present
Verify the second indicator is 'active' with background #007BFF
View the interactive map component
Verify a pin icon for 'Head Office' is visible at x: 250px, y: 150px (relative to map container), with source 'map_pin.svg', rendered dimensions 30x30px, and alt text 'Head Office Location'
Verify the map component has width 800px and height 600px
Scroll up
Verify the map's scroll-top position changes by 100px to simulate zoom
Open the rich text editor
Verify exactly 12 toolbar buttons are displayed
Verify the 'Bold' button is 'enabled', has accessibility label 'Bold (Ctrl+B)', background color #F0F0F0, and padding 8px
Verify when 'selected', its background color changes to #D0D0D0, with a 100ms transition
Verify the 'Italic' button has width 36px, height 36px, and is visible
Trigger a success notification

Verify a toast message appears in top-right corner at x: calc(100% - 320px), y: 20px, displays text 'Item added successfully!' with background color #28A745, color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, border radius 6px, has width 300px, height 50px, opacity 1, animates in using a 300ms slide-in animation, and remains visible for 3 seconds
